subject: Football
Staphylococcus Aureus
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. players have contracted 33 cases of the virulent skin infection known as MRSA over the past three years, a recent survey has found, a decrease of nearly 50 percent.
snippet: N.F.L. players have contracted 33 cases of the virulent skin infection known as MRSA over the past three years, a recent survey has found, a decrease of nearly 50 percent.
